data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 100,508 believers in Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 100,508 believers in Qiannan Buyei and Miao to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,224,392 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary:
the county of Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China has a population of 1,324,900.

We estimate Qiannan Buyei and Miao has 100,508 people who might know Jesus, 21,404 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,202,988 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,202,988 who are far from you in Qiannan Buyei and Miao, Guizhou, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
